channel.title: Compile Error
channel.description:
[b]Hello All, i tryed to compile a source but, im pretty close to do this.
But what does this means [code]Note: Client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Here is my simple compiler [code]@echo off title Stant Compiler javac Client.java pause[/code]
I seleceted the Client.java because i only need thats compiled, do anyone knows how i do that unchecked thing?
EDIT: I can also use this one
[code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause[/code]
But same happends, any ideas how to fix?
Second EDIT: I have tryed this one [code]@echo off title Stant Compiler javac -Xlint:unchecked client.java pause[/code]
But im getting one error of a line, how do i fix this line? [code]client.java:15235: warning: [unchecked] unchecked call to getDeclaredMethod(Stri ng,Class<?>...) as a member of the raw type Class Method openURL = fileMgr.getDeclaredMethod("open URL", new Class[] {String.class}); ^ 1 warning Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Its this line: Method openURL = fileMgr.getDeclaredMethod("open URL", new Class[] {String.class});
Im using this source/Server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520774.0.html So, if anyone could help me with this, please answer.[/b]

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Aske1gt, post:3, topic:433522”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=536243.msg3920808#msg3920808 date=1329685299]
This:

Note: Client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

Means nothing you need to worry about. The source will run fine.[/code]
[/quote]

Ohh, so i can just send the “Client” to my friend and he can connect to my hamachi?[/quote]
yeah. it will run fine…Although, he wont be able to connect unless you set up the host correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error
item.dc:creator: @Aske1gt Aske1gt
item.description:
@Aske1gt wrote:

[b]Hello All, i tryed to compile a source but, im pretty close to do this.

But what does this means

Note: Client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Press any key to continue . . .

Here is my simple compiler

@echo off title Stant Compiler javac Client.java pause

I seleceted the Client.java because i only need thats compiled, do anyone knows how i do that unchecked thing?

EDIT: I can also use this one

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause

But same happends, any ideas how to fix?

Second EDIT:
I have tryed this one

@echo off title Stant Compiler javac -Xlint:unchecked client.java pause

But im getting one error of a line, how do i fix this line?

client.java:15235: warning: [unchecked] unchecked call to getDeclaredMethod(Stri ng,Class<?>...) as a member of the raw type Class Method openURL = fileMgr.getDeclaredMethod("open URL", new Class[] {String.class}); ^ 1 warning Press any key to continue . . .

Its this line: Method openURL = fileMgr.getDeclaredMethod(“open
URL”, new Class[] {String.class});

Im using this source/Server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520774.0.html
So, if anyone could help me with this, please answer.[/b]
